Articles.Content: Are there any mods - besides RealChute, don't like dealing with that one - that add an inline parachute? Or even better, inline parachutes for all the stack sizes with appropriate height proportions?

Try Dr Jet's chop shop. Its got 0.625m, and 1.25m inline chutes (maybe even 2.5m, can't remember from the top of my head), as well as quite a few other very handy parts that fill out a few gaps as well as adding some flavour to the mix (I think the lander stage parts are great as well!) It became one of my "stock" mods in the past year.
Inline Ballutes is pretty nice. Might not be what you're looking for, though

RealChute is awesome!! And yeah, DJCS is nice too. 

14 hours ago, Epicdreamer said:

Try Dr Jet's chop shop. Its got 0.625m, and 1.25m inline chutes (maybe even 2.5m, can't remember from the top of my head), as well as quite a few other very handy parts that fill out a few gaps as well as adding some flavour to the mix (I think the lander stage parts are great as well!) It became one of my "stock" mods in the past year.

Or, (this isn't my field, don't ask me how,) make your own chute part?

And, yeah, I think  DJCS has a 2.5m chute.
